reviews.review_msg: I don't know why Keith has such low reviews? He's a great instructor and you can tell cares about the wellbeing of students. He's a grad (I think Phd now) student so he gets the stress of school & tries to accommodate to such. Psyc 365 is a lot of material, making it hard for any prof to cover everything in class - hence why he says to read the TB
Keith is pretty much unhelpful. Asked for questions regarding lectures, he would say it's in the slides or textbook. But the course was interesting. I learnt a lot. Read the textbook

The professor was kind and the course was easy yet engaging. Reading the textbook was crucial for exams. Although there were two midterms, the final was cumulative and had 100+ multiple-choice and a few essay questions. Be ready to read if you take this course.
